author: vmassol
msg: - Move aspects in a an aspect package
- Separate aspects from pure java code which makes it easier to swap a different AOP implementation should we need it and it also makes it easier for unit testing

author: vmassol
msg: Prevent Ant Delete task from failing in case of error (like when the directory does't exist).
